text: I would say it depends on where the audience is engaging with the emails. Heavy Gmail usage? Could be worth it for the brand trust/recognition. Heavy Outlook usage? Probably not. You can see which mailbox providers support it in <https://www.litmus.com/blog/what-is-bimi-and-why-should-email-marketers-care|this blog post>. There is a cost aspect as well for the VMC, <https://www.litmus.com/blog/how-to-set-up-bimi|which is optional> but if you want the logo to show up in Gmail, you must have it.
